title: Miley Cyrus cuddles up to her new boyfriend Cody Simpson during carefree ice cream date in LA
text:
Miley Cyrus and her new beau Cody Simpson have been going from strength to strength these last few weeks.

Simpson even recently dropped a single inspired by his new popstar flame, entitled Golden Thing.

The couple stepped out Friday night in Los Angeles for some ice cream and some PDA.

I scream, you scream: Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson stepped out Friday night in Los Angeles for some ice cream and some PDA

They were spotted taking a stroll, cones in hand, before they broke out into dance, Simpson twirling Cyrus around.

Cyrus was very affectionate with her new beau, hanging off his back before they shared a passionate kiss.

They both channeled some '90s vibes as Cyrus sported a tiny white t-shirt with some slim high-waisted light denim jeans.

She completed the look with some blinged-out jewelry and a pair of black leather pointed booties.

Dancing in the streets: They were spotted taking a stroll, cones in hand, before they broke out into dance, Simpson twirling Cyrus around

PDA alert: Cyrus was very affectionate with her new beau as they walked around in LA

Get a room: She hung off his back as they waited at a crosswalk

Kiss kiss: Cyrus then wrapped her arms around Simpson as they shared a passionate kiss

The 26-year-old wore her hair in a ponytail, as she carried a grey tartan blazer over her arm.

Simpson, 22, served some light ska punk in a white No Doubt t-shirt with black leather pants.

He completed his look with some bling as well, paired with an army green beanie and a pair of black suede boots, embellished in silver chains.

'90s vibes: They both channeled some '90s vibes as Cyrus sported a tiny white t-shirt with some slim high-waisted light denim jeans

Bling bling: She completed the look with some blinged-out jewelry and a pair of black leather pointed booties

Light ska punk: Simpson served some light ska punk in a white No Doubt t-shirt with black leather pants

They were spotted the next morning stepping out for a coffee run at The Oaks Gourmet Market in Hollywood.

Cyrus donned a white Black Flag t-shirt tucked into a similar pair of jeans with a black leather belt and black leather stiletto booties with silver buckles.

Simpson sported last night's look with a black t-shirt from Mystery Pier Books on Sunset.

Coffee run: They were spotted the next morning stepping out for a coffee run at The Oaks Gourmet Market in Hollywood
description: They were spotted taking a stroll, cones in hand, before they broke out into dance. Cyrus was very affectionate with her new beau, hanging off his back before they shared a passionate kiss.
